title: Where are the Tryndamere compensation buffs?
body: Tryndamere was hit much harder than Yasuo by the crit item changes, making it so that there are no good cdr items for him to buy and nerfing his damage with the infinity edge nerf (the new passive is useless if you already have conqueror) and earlier statikk shiv nerfs.  Yasuo got a compensation buff within days but Tryndamere has only gotten 2 minor buffs since season 3.

replies.body:
Are you high?

Who is your supplier? I could definitely use whatever the fuck you're on.

> [{quoted}](name=IDontCareLeague,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LkR5RWkq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-12T22:34:59.543+0000)

Me too, even I don't get stuff that's as good as this guy's

Why all these downvotes?? Tryndamere is so bad right now and the only solutions you have provided us with is RUSH IE. Do you know how bronzie that idea is?? You LITERALLY have to back with at least 1300  gold  3 times in order to try to build that expensive item. Its more expensive worse build path and worse stats. True damage isn't good because noone plays tanks EVER. Tryndamere can't build essence reaver making him lose critical chance early a better build path AND 20% CDR he is so weak right now he has been 46% winrate in top which is the only role he can ACTUALLY PLAY! Also if you rush infinity edge you only DELAY your boots and your waveclear not able to pressure the enemy laner you all think that damage is the only thing that tryndamere is because your brains can't exceed further than that. It is awful and 2 patches now we have only been searching for an okay build on the reddit but cannot find a viable one. Tryndamere doesn't have runes that work for him other than the conqueror keystone and the alacrity rune, the rest of his rune page is completely useless for him. You guys don't know better Tryndamere than me OR the other guy that posted this BECAUSE YOU DON'T EVEN PLAY TRYNDAMERE FFS WHY ARE YOU EVEN TRYING TO TALK ABOUT A CHAMPION YOU CLEARLY KNOW NOTHING ABOUT TRY TO OPEN A CONVERSATION ABOUT A CHAMPION YOU ARE FAMILIAR WITH DON'T JUST SAY RUSH IE FOR SOME USELESS AD.

> Tryndamere is so bad right now 

He's always been bad.

> the only solutions you have provided us with is RUSH IE. Do you know how bronzie that idea is??

That's an opinion, not a fact.

> worse stats.

It gives the exact same amount of AD as it did before, doubles your crit chance, and turns 15% of it into true damage. That isn't "worse" in the slightest.

> True damage isn't good because noone plays tanks EVER. 

Proof?

> he has been 46% winrate in top

He's sitting just below 49% winrate according to Champion.gg: http://champion.gg/champion/Tryndamere/Top?

> you all think that damage is the only thing that tryndamere is because your brains can't exceed further than that

Okay, explain to me what he does other than deal damage.

> Tryndamere doesn't have runes that work for him other than the conqueror keystone and the alacrity rune, the rest of his rune page is completely useless for him

Again, that's opinion, and not fact.

This is what I mean when I say "EUNE" players.

You just scream at everyone and pretend your opinion is more valid than anyone else.

That's a dick thing to do.

1. He has been a lot better if you searched his past on the internet since cc and shields keep on populating as league progresses

2.Not an opinion other than AD you OBVIOUSLY need things like CDR MS AS waveclear. having none of that at 12 minutes is really bad and unplayable.

4.Since bruisers were revived when conqueror got released people finally quitted playing tanks they are played a lot less obviously the noone is an exaggeration.

5. He trully was at 46% and he still is on OP.GG an actual legit site xD!!

6. That is the reason why you are hardstuck low silver. Again I will explain: MS CDR AS HP AD AP ONE HIT PASSIVES ACTIVES LIKE BORK'S PHAGE PASSIVE SHEEN PASSIVE HEALTH REGEN LIFESTEAL TIAMAT ACTIVE TIAMAT PASSIVE.   All of those stats are what else Tryndamere is in need of when building items not fucking AD from Infinity Edge so that makes Tryndamere create pressure by shoving in waves clearing camps and objectives more effeciently cause distractions tank damage and cc. What a surprise, he doesn't only deal damage.

7.Not an opinion It is a fact you blind human being. you can go on Tryndamere One tricks' streams or even on the reddit and peope constantly discuss about which runes can be Actually viable on him. 

8. I am sorry KAYLE abuser but I don't think you know my Main better than myself because you haven't played over a 1000 games of him before. The rest of the people here don't play Tryndamere either and I explain that more on the CAPS LOCK part.

Use your brain this time HARDSTUCK LOW SILVER KAYLE ABUSER. And don't cry about your rank not everyone is good at this game.

> [{quoted}](name=gkario,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LkR5RWkq,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-29T21:22:02.378+0000)
>
> He has been a lot better if you searched his past on the internet since cc and shields keep on populating as league progresses

Cc is only getting stronger, I'll admit, but shields (support shields) got nerfed back in 8.12 so I don't think that's a valid argument.

> .Not an opinion other than AD you OBVIOUSLY need things like CDR MS AS waveclear. having none of that at 12 minutes is really bad and unplayable.

Again. That is an opinion. Not a fact.

Riot hasn't released a "You must build this on Tryndamere" list at any point in time so saying what Tryndamere does or doesn't need is all opinion.

> Of course the stats are worse look at the old IE and then think what you are talking about.

I don't think you're listening to what I said.

1. It gives the same amount of AD so you don't lose out on anything.

2. Old IE gave a flat 20% crit chance meaning you'd only go to 55%. New IE doubles crit chance meaning you'll go to 70%. That's way better.

3. Yeah the true damage is kinda bad but it's better than nothing.

> Since bruisers were revived when conqueror got released people finally quitted playing tanks they are played a lot less obviously the noone is an exaggeration.

I'd still like to see some proof.

> He trully was at 46% and he still is on OP.GG an actual legit site xD!!

Champion.gg and OP.GG is made by the same people.

Besides, you haven't actually provided a link to where it says his winrate so unless you can do that, I'm going to disregard it.

(By the way, Tryndamere has actually climbed to a almost 51% winrate now. Saying he's only 46% is a large understatement).

Source: http://champion.gg/champion/Tryndamere/Top?

> Again I will explain: MS CDR AS HP AD AP ONE HIT PASSIVES ACTIVES LIKE BORK'S PHAGE PASSIVE SHEEN PASSIVE HEALTH REGEN LIFESTEAL TIAMAT ACTIVE TIAMAT PASSIVE. All of those stats are what else Tryndamere is in need of when building items not fucking AD from Infinity Edge so that makes Tryndamere create pressure by shoving in waves clearing camps and objectives more effeciently cause distractions tank damage and cc. What a surprise, he doesn't only deal damage.

In order to create pressure, you need damage.

In order to shove in waves, you need damage.

In order to clear camps, you need damage.

In order to take down objectives, you need damage.

I still fail to see how he does anything else, but damage.

> Not an opinion It is a fact you blind human being. you can go on Tryndamere One tricks' streams or even on the reddit and peope constantly discuss about which runes can be Actually viable on him.

Discussing what runes are viable isn't the same as every rune being bad on him.

> I don't think you know my Main better than myself because you haven't played over a 1000 games of him before. The rest of the people here don't play Tryndamere either and I explain that more on the CAPS LOCK part.

I think it's a little bit unfair to say "duh I play this champion more than you do so that automatically makes my opinion more valid than yours".

Yeah I don't play him a lot, but that doesn't mean I can't discuss him and his current state in the game.

> Go back to drinking your baby oil or whatever and properly answer to me with proper fucking points not this shit:

I did answer you with points, but you choose not to listen.
